recaps.title: Lightning Network Workshop Recap
recaps.summary: Our November Lightning workshop brought together 25+ participants to learn about payment channels, routing, and hands-on node operation.

sections.title: Event Highlights
sections.body: The workshop started with an overview of Lightning Network architecture, followed by practical demonstrations of channel management and payment routing. Participants set up testnet nodes and successfully made their first Lightning payments.

sections.title: Key Takeaways
sections.body:
- Lightning enables instant, low-cost Bitcoin payments
- Channel management requires understanding liquidity and routing
- Running a node is more accessible than ever with modern tools
- The Lightning ecosystem is growing rapidly with new applications

sections.title: Community Feedback
sections.body: Attendees appreciated the hands-on approach and practical focus. Many expressed interest in running production nodes and exploring Lightning development opportunities. Several participants are now planning to build Lightning-enabled applications.

sections.title: What's Next
sections.body: Following this workshop, we're planning an advanced session on channel rebalancing and routing optimization. Stay tuned for announcements about upcoming events.
